TopicTitle: My explosions aren't as detailed as everyone elses?

Articles.Content: Hi, i'm new to KSP, and i've noticed (from various youtube videos and whatnot) that my explosions aren't as detailed as everyone elses. I'm running 0.16 because of the larger mod base, but the explosions lack the black smoke effects, and instead are simple just orange explosions. I've looked in the graphic options, and couldn't find a fix, and i've also confirmed that these explosions should be implemented in 0.16... So if anyone could tell me why my explosion effects are lacking, and how to fix it, I would be greatly appreciative...

Hi strutman12345, welcome to the community

Not sure about the explosions, though they were changed a while back to help reduce frame rate problems, it might help if you could post a screenshot of your explosions so we can compare them.

The explosions were changed in .16. They got rid of the classic "spider" type black smoke explosions in favor of a simpler, less graphically intensive system that takes into account whether the part is explosive or not, e.g. fuel tanks and engines will explode, but wings and structural components disappear into a cloud of dust.

Most of the videos on YouTube are likely pre-.16, and have the classic explosions.

Welcome to the forums strutman12345 (More of them...)

Sorry I can't help you as I didn't notice any changes in explosions but the other two people here have so refer to their advice but from what I can tell, they changed over updates so they could reduce lag.

Although, make sure you check out these forums properly, there it lots to do from KSP discussion, to other topics.

Have fun playing KSP and on here and go blow up some rockets! (My trademark Welcome Aboard signature seems to be strangely relevant...)
